Html:
I am new to asp.net, I used the clubsite to setup my new website which is hosted by godaddy.com. I finally have everything working except the forums. Users can post to the forum, but then the post cannot be seen. If I look in the ms sql database I can see the post. I have had others look at this, but to no avail. Please help.

If you need to view this the site is www.carolinaskappaclub.com
Have you entered all the required fields? It should work. If you want, you can ZIP up your source and I can take a look.

I think part of my problem has to do with this post: http://www.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ProjectName=ClubStarterKit&ThreadId=10323 . Has anyone found a fix for the permissions problems when uploading the sheme to goDaddy? Also, I just found today that the addAttendance Stored Procedure did not load. I think my major issue is that I am missing several Stored Procedures, but I need help getting them to load properly.

Thanks in advance.
